question: ok i hve pcos n ibs. I hve family history of heart problems including high bp n my husband has family history of heart n diAbetes. My midwife referred me to hospital.  I hve this weird wind pain it has become almost mission impossible to pass it. N when i hve wind trapped in my body i get so bad pain almost if i move i can cramp my intestines or  i dnt knw may be baby as well  thts how i feel. Whn i told doc in hospital she said its f9. I ws bit shocked n honestly disappointed. So she transferred me bck to midwife saying everything is f9 with her.  has anybody else had this problem b4?
title: hospital put me off high risk pregnancy
